> <OLD>
>
> Hydras Hissed and said"Land this shuttle in the coordinates that we just
> give.... Be carefull and scan the area before"

As the shuttle comes down the shuttle continues to scan the area,
however nothing but the debris can be detected.

The area itself, like much of this stretch of land is nearly barren.
The haze of brown and grey that sits over the mine city is here as
well although much lighter. Light vegatation struggles to survive here
on the meager light that shines through and the depleted minerals that
remain in the soil. There are a few young trees here and there and
some small scrub bushes and wild grasses that sprout up in small
patches. Foul winds blow through this region.

In the distance, nearly a mile away from where the shuttle landed is
the mine city itself, smoke and ash rising up from it as the mining of
ore and metals contiued.

The shuttle touched down lightly and the doors open letting in the
odors of burnt metals, ash and other unidentifable but unpleasent
odors.

"This air is Foul!" Injector, one of the fuzor warriors that was on
the shuttle said.

"Smells good to me." Terrorgator, another of the Fuzor Predacons said.
"Smells a little like home, minus the burnt metal.

"Why don't we get out and start searching?" Injector said as the other
Predacons started grumbling and mumbling, ready to start searching.

(TAG)

OOC: The soldiers with Hydras. The rest are at the base, helping the
stand gaurd or have been captured on the other shuttle.
